t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-AllGroups
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: maxOccurs may now be >1
wildcards are now allowed
derivation by extension
derivation by restriction
named model group references in xs:all

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-Assertions
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: on complex types
on simple types
derivation by restriction (assertions of base type inherited)
derivation by extension (assertions of base type inherited)
rules for whether the XDM view is typed or untyped
rules for the static and dynamic context of the XPath expression
inability to navigate outside the subtree
errors in XPath evaluation are treated as a false result
impact of xpathDefaultNamespace locally and at schema level

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-CTA
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: basic
xs:error type
derivation by restriction
inheritable attributes
XPath expression can only access attributes
static and dynamic context of XPath expression
static errors in XPath expression
dynamic errors in evaluation of XPath expression
all alternatives must be substitutable for the declared type
default branch
impact of xpathDefaultNamespace locally and at schema level
consistency of type tables in Element Declarations Consistent

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-OpenContent
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: suffix open content
interleave open content
with element-only content model
with mixed content model
derivation by extension
derivation by restriction, including mode="none"
with complex type with simple content (ineffective)
<openContent> id attribute
<openContent> annotation child
defaultOpenContent as child of xs:schema
defaultOpenContent different across schema documents
defaultOpenContent appliesToEmpty = true
defaultOpenContent appliesToEmpty = false
defaultOpenContent applies to types within xs:redefine
defaultOpenContent applies to types within xs:override

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-SubstitutionGroups
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Element in more than one subst group
Abstract elements allowed in subst group

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-NewLocalDecl
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Target namespace on local element declarations
Target namespace on local attribute declarations
Named identity constraints on local element declarations

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-ConditionalInclusion
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: The vc:minVersion and vc:maxVersion attributes can be used for testing processor version number
The vc:typeAvailable and vc:typeUnavailable attributes can be used to test supported types
The vc:facetAvailable and vc:facetUnavailable attributes can be used to test supported facets
Unrecognized attributes in vc: namespace are not an error (but a warning is encouraged)

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-Wildcards
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: not namespace
not QName
not #defined
not #definedSibling
Relaxation of UPA: wildcard/element competition no longer violates UPA
tighter rule for EDC as regards the type of an element that matches a wildcard

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-DateTimeTypes
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: ExplicitTimezone facet
dateTimeStamp derived type
Allow year zero
Disallow leap seconds
Equality of (for example) PT1D and PT24H
Built in derived types xs:yearMonthDuration and xs:dayTimeDuration

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-PrecisionDecimal
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Validation of precisionDecimal values
precisionDecimal facets

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-UnionTypes
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Types derived by restriction from a union type
xsi:type used to name a member of a restricted union type
Cyclicity of union types

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-xml1_1Support
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: xs:Name and related types may now contain XML 1.1 name characters (ID)
Support for additional Unicode characters in content
XML 1.1 name characters now allowed in names of components (e.g. types, model groups) (ID)
XML 1.1 name characters now match \i and \c in regular expressions (ID)

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-RestrictionComplexTypes
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: "Intensional restriction": allows some restrictions that 1.0 disallowed
Restrict xs:all to xs:sequence
Restrict xs:all to xs:choice

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-Misc
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Default/fixed values for xsi:type and xsi:nil permitted but have no effect
xsi:type must resolve to a type definition
xs:anyAtomicType
complexType/@mixed and complexContent/@mixed must not conflict
equality of an atomic value with a singleton list in ID/IDREF constraints
impact of xpathDefaultNamespace locally and globally on key/keyref/unique selection expressions
lexical representation +INF for float and double, and handling of negative zero
use of hyphens within square brackets in regular expressions
Changes to rules for Unicode block names in regular expressions
xs:anyURI now allows any sequence of characters
units of length for lists and other types
Leading plus allowed in xs:unsignedInt etc
Effect of whitespace=collapse on all-white nodes

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-SchemaComposition
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: xs:override
Referring to a namespace requires an xs:import (probably already in 1.0 suite)
... except for the xs and xsi namespaces
Cyclic dependencies redefine-include-import-override
Effect of chameleon include on unqualified names in XPath expressions

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-DefaultAttributeGroup
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: with defaultAttributesApply=true or defaulted
with defaultAttributesApply=false
different across multiple schema documents
applies to types within xs:redefine
applies to types within xs:override

t1_1:test-feature.name: xsd1_1-ID-IDREF
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: Lists of ID
Unions involving ID
Multiple attributes of type ID
Default values of type IDREF, ENTITY, or ENTITIES
Default values for elements or attributes of type ID

t1_1:test-feature.name: xst1_1-PSVI-tests
t1_1:test-feature.description: PSVI output of validation episodes (PSVI output is not tested)
t1_1:test-feature.t1_1:feature-category: xsi:type fallback to lax validation when type does not resolve
